name: CreateNewDeploymentCheck
description:
Create a new deployment check using Vercel API.

Use this tool to initiate a new check for a specific deployment in Vercel. This requires providing a deployment ID and must be authorized with OAuth2 to avoid errors.

parameters.name: deployment_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the deployment to create the check for.

value_schema.description: The deployment to create the check for.

parameters.name: check_name
parameters.description: The name of the check being created. This is required to identify the check purpose.

value_schema.description: The name of the check being created

parameters.name: block_deployment_on_failure
parameters.description: Indicates if the check should block a deployment from succeeding.

value_schema.description: Whether the check should block a deployment from succeeding

parameters.name: team_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier used to perform the request on behalf of a team.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: team_slug
parameters.description: The slug (unique identifier) of the team to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: page_path_to_check
parameters.description: Specify the path of the page that is being checked. This should be a string value representing the specific page path for the deployment check.

value_schema.description: Path of the page that is being checked

parameters.name: details_url
parameters.description: A URL that provides further details about the check. Expected format is a valid URL string.

value_schema.description: URL to display for further details

parameters.name: external_identifier
parameters.description: A unique identifier used as an external reference for the check.

value_schema.description: An identifier that can be used as an external reference

parameters.name: allow_rerun_request
parameters.description: Allow users to request a rerun of the check if it fails. Use a boolean value.

value_schema.description: Whether a user should be able to request for the check to be rerun if it fails

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the vercel API.

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: deploymentId
parameters.description: The deployment to create the check for.

value_schema.description: The deployment to create the check for.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the check being created

value_schema.description: The name of the check being created

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Path of the page that is being checked

value_schema.description: Path of the page that is being checked

parameters.name: blocking
parameters.description: Whether the check should block a deployment from succeeding

value_schema.description: Whether the check should block a deployment from succeeding

parameters.name: detailsUrl
parameters.description: URL to display for further details

value_schema.description: URL to display for further details

parameters.name: externalId
parameters.description: An identifier that can be used as an external reference

value_schema.description: An identifier that can be used as an external reference

parameters.name: rerequestable
parameters.description: Whether a user should be able to request for the check to be rerun if it fails

value_schema.description: Whether a user should be able to request for the check to be rerun if it fails
